title: The Michael Palin Diaries - The Python Years  (BBC)
description:
Audio Books : Humor : Other quality : English



BBC Book of the Week - Abridged.




A short taster from Michael Palin's Diaries focusing on the Monty Python years after the TV series ended, during which the movies were made.

Read by Michael Palin.

First Broadcast as BBC Radio 4's Book of the Week in January 2006.

Five 15 minute episodes. My recordings at 160kbps mp3.

1, The Holy Grail
After a few years apart the team reassemble for their movie debut.

2, Branching Out
The fun and mayhem continues as the Pythons head to the US to promote The Holy Grail, but at home - the team are making tentative moves away from Python with their own ventures.

3, My Father
A touching and poignant episode about Michael's relationship with his ailing father.

4, Saturday Night Live
Michael's surreal experiences surrounding an appearance as the guest host of Saturday Night Live, including a visit to an Andy Warhol party at Studio 54 in New York.

5, The Life of Brian
The Monty Python team meet up to film The Life of Brian.


Have fun & please seed when you are done.
